mapper.select: select count(*) from member m, report r where r.id = m.id and r.regdate between to_date(to_char(sysdate,'yyyy-MM-dd')) and sysdate and r.retype = 1 and r.occurtype = '1' and m.address like '%'||#{depart}||'%' and r.redone = 1 order by r.regdate desc

select count(*) from member m, report r where r.id = m.id and r.regdate between to_date(to_char(sysdate,'yyyy-MM-dd')) and sysdate and r.retype = 1 and r.occurtype = '2' and m.address like '%'||#{depart}||'%' and r.redone = 1 order by r.regdate desc

select count(*) from member m, report r where r.id = m.id and r.regdate between to_date(to_char(sysdate,'yyyy-MM-dd')) and sysdate and r.retype = 1 and r.occurtype = '3' and m.address like '%'||#{depart}||'%' and r.redone = 1 order by r.regdate desc

select m.id as m_id, m.name as m_name, m.address,m.phone, m.picture, m.memtype, m.gender, r.rno, r.regdate as r_regDate, r.content, r.wcode, r.occurtime, decode(r.occurtype, '1', '응급출동', '2', '119출동' ,'화재발생') as occurtype, f.name as e_name from member m, report r, fieldstaff f where r.id = m.id and r.wcode = f.wcode and r.regdate between to_date(#{startDate}) and to_date(#{endDate}) + 0.99999 and r.retype = 1 and m.address like '%'||#{depart}||'%' and r.redone = 1 order by r.regdate desc

select count(*) from member m, report r, fieldstaff f where r.id = m.id and r.wcode = f.wcode and r.regdate between to_date(#{startDate}) and to_date(#{endDate}) + 0.99999 and r.retype = 1 and m.address like '%'||#{depart}||'%' and r.redone = 1 order by r.regdate desc

select m.id as m_id, m.name as m_name, m.address,m.phone, m.picture, m.memtype, m.gender, r.rno, r.regdate as r_regDate, r.content, r.wcode, r.occurtime, decode(r.occurtype, '1', '응급출동', '2', '119출동' ,'화재발생') as occurtype, f.name as e_name from member m, report r, fieldstaff f where r.id = m.id and r.wcode = f.wcode and r.retype = 1 and r.redone = 1 and r.rno = #{rno} order by r.regdate desc
